preguntas.text: Illustrate, draw, and animate digitally.
Play an instrument and compose music.
Design logos and magazine covers.
Paint, create sculptures, illustrate art books, etc.
Prepare to be a professional model.
Conduct excavations to uncover remains from the past.
Organize events and attend to their participants.
Defend individual clients or companies in various types of lawsuits.
Investigate the causes and effects of emotional disorders.
Write journalistic articles, stories, novels, and others.
Select, train, and motivate staff in an organization/company.
Plan the medium and long-term goals of a public or private organization.
Control income and expenses of funds and present the final balance of an institution.
Make proposals and formulate strategies to leverage economic relations between two countries.
Develop campaigns to introduce a new product to the market.
Design software programs and explore new technological applications for internet use.
Solve calculus problems to construct a bridge.
Design and plan the mass production of items such as furniture, cars, office equipment, packaging, and containers for food and others.
Conceive plans for houses, buildings, and communities.
Research and test new pharmaceutical products.
Raise, care for, and treat domestic and farm animals.
Research green areas, the environment, and climate change.
Design courses to educate people about health and hygiene topics.
Attend to the health of sick individuals.
Conduct experiments with plants (fruits, trees, flowers).
